titleInfo.title: ‘SKETCH Of the PENINSULA OR CAPE OF ADEN’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink with wash on paperDimensions:657 x 990 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Relief shown by shading.Plan of Aden peninsula showing positions of the Isthmus reservoirs, proposed new lakes and water tanks; military limits dated 25th August 1855 outlined in red with buildings in the camp site labelled. Landmarks lettered for references with a key below title and an explanatory note in the lower right of plan.Inscriptions:On recto, lower left:‘Executive Engineers Office Aden’.
